CHEESE SUB, MOZZARELLA SHREDDED VEGAN BULK BAG REF

recipeMethods.stepInstructions:
1. Preheat impinger oven to 500°F, with belt time set to 1 minute, 20 
seconds.

2. Slice torpedo roll in half, lengthwise.

2. Squeeze 1 oz chipotle BBQ sauce from a squeeze bottle on to 
bottom half of torpedo. 

3. Place a prepared boca patty over chipotle BBQ sauce. 

4. Evenly distribute 1/4 oz caramelized onions over the patty. 

5. Sprinkle 1 oz vegan mozzarella evenly over onions.
 
6. Place on screen and toast for 1 minute, 20 seconds at 500°F.

7. Squeeze 1 oz chipotle BBQ sauce from a squeeze bottle on to top 
half of sandwich roll. 

8. Top toasted sandwich with 1 1/2 oz spinach. 

9. Place top half of bread over sandwich.

10. Place toasted sandwich in to-go container and serve.
